name: Bug Blaster (zerofaction)
description:
Bug Blaster is a 2D sidescroller based on classics like Ghosts n Goblins. All programming, art, music and sounds made by Zerofaction.

The game was made in a month for the GameOff 2021 jam, with the theme "Bug". Check out the source code for the game here: https://github.com/zer0faction/GameOff2021
